text: - [Narrator] Migrating to AWS?
Cisco Full-Stack Observability Solutions

help you connect the dots
every step of the way.
Let's see how.

Adrienne is an engineer
at an industrial plant

and she's migrating
the company ERP to AWS.
So she uses Cisco AppDynamics

to get visibility into
our on-premise workloads

and to create a performance
baseline to work from.
Isaac, the network admin,

helps her verify network
connections and benchmarks
with Cisco ThousandEyes.

She logs into Cisco
Intersight Workload Optimizer
to see which AWS templates to use.
Time to migrate.
Everything is going well

until, suddenly, the
robots on the plant floor

can't connect to the
applications in the VPC.
ThousandEyes saves the day.
It debugs the issue in hours, not weeks.
After moving more workloads,
Adrienne checks their performance.
Things are looking good.
The migration finishes two weeks early.

A new baseline from AppDynamics
shows a 40% improvement.
And Cisco Secure Application
is protecting apps and data from threats,
which delights Val from Security.
But Adrienne isn't finished.

She tunes workloads with
IWO, saving 15% a year.

When Amyet, the Executive
Sponsor, asks for more,
Adrienne tells her that modernization
could save another 10%.

Looks like Adrienne's next
project will be modernization.

Full-Stack Observability
Solutions from Cisco on AWS

connect the dots when you
lift, shift and modernize.

Deploy rapidly, pay-as-you-go
and scale globally.
(upbeat music)
